title: Online Leadership Competency Development for Information Literacy Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Program focusing on strengthening information evaluation and utilization skills required for managerial decision-making, targeting learners in administrative/leadership roles.

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the credibility of various information sources based on three criteria (author, source, recency)
Learners can identify workplace-related fake news cases with 90% accuracy
Learners can conduct peer information-sharing discussions using collaborative tools within the LMS at least twice
Learners can explain procedures for managing sensitive corporate data in accordance with information security principles
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
